/usr/local/cuda/bin/nvcc -forward-unknown-to-host-compiler  --default-stream per-thread -Xcompiler -fPIC --generate-code=arch=compute_60,code=[compute_60,sm_60] --generate-code=arch=compute_60,code=[compute_60,sm_60] --generate-code=arch=compute_60,code=[compute_60,sm_60] --generate-code=arch=compute_60,code=[compute_60,sm_60] -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/generate_cpmm.dir/applications/cpmm/generate_cpmm.cc.o -o CMakeFiles/generate_cpmm.dir/cmake_device_link.o   -L/usr/local/cuda/targets/x86_64-linux/lib  -lstdc++fs -lpthread  libbbts-common.a -ldl -lm -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt
